parameters: Thank you for talking with me!
Like this event, you can also create an event
that will be executed if you select it with the cursor
Tell me about SRPG Engine MV
The point of this battle system
I wonder if there is anything special
Tell me about SRPG Engine MV
"SRPG Engine MV" is a collection of plugins to create
Strategy RPG (Tactical Battle System) with RPG Maker MV!
So far, this is a collection of plugins have been made for
each series of RPG Maker, such as XP, VX, and VX Ace,
but this time the work has been created from scratch
The basic principle of this work is
I'm designing it to be able extending its functionality
In addition, you can use the event for the units,
make it possible to make the processing from
start of the battle and at the end of every the turn by
using the event, and set it in the notetag at the database.
By using the original function of RPG Maker MV,
I'm aiming for a collection of plugins that are
easy to handle even for beginners!
I will divide my explanation into keyboard and
Decision key: selecting unit and move it to the destination, command decision
Cancel key: menu, back to front
Click and Tap: move the cursor, decision
When deciding the destination, move the cursor with the first
left click/touch → click and touch again to move to the
If you choose a character that still not acting,
you can make a move! The tiles where it shine blue
is a moving range. The red shine is indicating the farthest
After you move, there are actor commands!
You can use one of the actor commands.
Maybe you want to try using magic and items!
On the menu screen, you can end the turn,
change units equipment, check units status!
The point of this battle system
There is a highlight for each battle!
I will tell you if you find me with a cursor
I'm going to relax, bug fixing and adding features!
If you've made an "extension plugin"! or tried to
"improve this plugin", please let me know!
It's a sample to get people to experience the plugin
and can be used as a reference!
As a reference material, this project file is published
on the author's site "Lemon slice", so if you are
I wonder if there is anything special
As you can see, even in SRPG combat, you can still talk to
me if you look at me with a cursor.
You can make an event like that!
By the way, you can store it in the switch and use
it in the event whether it is in combat or not!
That's why my topic is difference when I am in battle and
By the way, I can  still talk to you even during SRPG battle
if you find me with cursor!
This project file can be found on the author's site
"Lemon slice" It has been released as a material reference!
If you are interested, try to download it.
Executed at every start of actors phase.
If there are multiple pages, the first page is used.
It is used for processing event at the start of the actor phase.
- Displaying "Player Turn" messages and changing BGM
- Conversation events at the start of actor phase, etc.
Moves the cursor (player) to the specified coordinates.
Makes the specified event become actor.
What happened to me, I was unconscious...
Moves the cursor (player) to the specified coordinates.
Makes the specified event become enemy.
They are going to aim the witch girl!
What... I am also a girl.
Hey Orc, are you looking after me...？
Makes the specified event become actor.
It looks like you are in trouble guys!
Don't worry... I will help you!
Remember to treat me some food later!
I'm making this kind of processing using event!
If you put a condition in the event contents,
the event starts at that specified condition.
The process at the start of the battle and every turns
is made using event, and even the victory and defeat
of the battle are also implemented by using the event!
By the way, Slime, who was on the north side of the bridge,
was originally aiming for event ID No. 12
(Harold if you don't change the formation, so you may
refer the settings using MV editor!)
Executed at every start of enemies phase.
If there are multiple pages, the first page is used.
It is used for processing event at the start of the enemy phase.
- Displaying "Enemy Turn" messages and changing BGM
- Conversation events at the start of enemy phase, etc.
Executed after all actors and enemies finishing their phases.
If there are multiple pages, the first page is used.
Enter the event you want to run after actors and enemies finishing their phases.
- Conversation event at the end of the turn
- Condition for Victory or Defeat by certain number of turn
(The number of turn is stored in a Variable ID: 3 by default)
This event executed before actor and enemy fighting scene.
If there are multiple pages, the first page is used.
- This is the event that will be executed in specific condition
This event is executed after each Actor vs Enemy fighting scene.
If there are multiple pages, the first page is used.
After each fighting scene between actor vs enemy
you can enter any events that will be executed.
In addition, it is used as a main function to
decide "Victory" or "Defeat" result in SRPG Battle.
- The number of actors and enemy that exists is reaching 0
If the conditions are met, execute
to end the SRPG Battle scene.
Move the cursor (player) to the specified coordinates.
He was robbed the sacred treasure of the Holy Church...
The Sacred Treasures of the Holy Church...?
We promise to take back the treasure.
One day, a new hero will show up and clear this game.
This is an event that becomes an actor unit.
You can easily set it with the event note.
As the Actor id is not specified here (zero),
the actors are set automatically from lowest EventID order

It is executed only once, when SRPG_Battle Start begin.
If there are multiple event pages, the first page is used.
In addition to the plugin side initialization process,
you can input the event you want to run from the start.
- Battle preparation at the start of the battle
- Conversation at the start of the Battle, etc.
